alert.note: Alert for Juana Diaz (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 26 at 5:17PM ADT until August 26 at 7:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Juana Diaz and Villalba. * WHEN...Until 600 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 416 PM AST, satellite estimates indicate heavy rain from thunderstorms in the advisory area. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
